message:
Another life sentence given to a trafficker involved in sex trafficking of minors. Great job by all those involved in getting justice for the victims. 

“A Fort Worth pimp known as “Zigg” has been sentenced to life in federal prison for sex-trafficking children”

data.description: A Fort Worth Texas pimp who along with other men operated a statewide sex-trafficking operation that included young teens has been sentenced to life in federal prison.
data.title: Fort Worth pimp ‘Zigg’ gets life for sex trafficking children in statewide ring
